events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position, including the updated resume and cover letter.
The candidate's application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on key skills in software development and DevOps experience.
Assigned recruiter has been notified to handle the candidate's screening and subsequent interview scheduling for the engineering role.
The initial phone screening was successfully completed and candidate showed strong experience in backend development and cloud services.
Candidate responded promptly and positively to the interview invitation, confirming availability for the next technical interview.
Scheduled the candidateâ€™s technical interview with the engineering team to evaluate coding skills and system design knowledge.
